section: Submissions Provided to or Posted Using the Services

text: Without limiting 1UpCoin’s rights or any other disclaimers in these Terms, You understand and agree that 1UpCoin specifically disclaims all responsibility, and shall not be liable in any way, for:
Changing value of cryptocurrencies due to market fluctuations
Taxes on buying, selling, trading, or use of cryptocurrencies
Delays in processing of cryptocurrency transactions
Errors in entering wallet addresses
Errors in scanning QR codes

You may, at your option, take part in the 1UpCoin Referral Program. Referred users must sign up through the unique link to count towards your referral points. You will be awarded one point per referred user who signs up, connects a stream notification service, connects a cryptocurrency wallet service, and for each donation they receive. Referred users only earn you points in the month they are referred. Points reset on the 1st of each month.

If you are eligible for the rewards listed on the Referrals page for that month, we will attempt to award it within 30 days following the end of the month. The following may make you ineligible for a reward:
Not providing 1UpCoin a way to contact you
Patterns of suspicious donations to or from referred streamers
Being under age 18
Being an owner or employee of Warp World, LLC or the household member of any such owner or employee
Living in any jurisdiction which would make the referral reward unlawful

Rewards are provided at the sole discretion of Warp World, LLC. In the event of a tie, rewards will be split event among all eligible referrers. The referral program is our way of thanking you for your hard work and skill in recruiting new streamers to our platform, and is not a sweepstakes or lottery. We reserve the right to end the referral program at any time without notice.
